Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: This Workflow retrieves contacts from HubSpot, processes each contact, maps the data, and creates corresponding Account records in Salesforce. It logs success or error for each record based on the Salesforce response.

Properties.Description: Read a page of contacts. Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.
Properties.Name: Name

Properties.Description: The maximum number of results to display per page.
Properties.Name: limit
Request
Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="Account">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="IsDeleted" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="MasterRecordId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Type" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ParentId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="BillingStreet" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="BillingCity" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="BillingState" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="BillingPostalCode" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="BillingCountry" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="BillingLatitude" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="BillingLongitude" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="BillingGeocodeAccuracy" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="BillingAddress">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="Accuracy" />
                    <xs:element name="City" />
                    <xs:element name="Country" />
                    <xs:element name="CountryCode" />
                    <xs:element name="Latitude" />
                    <xs:element name="Longitude" />
                    <xs:element name="PostalCode" />
                    <xs:element name="State" />
                    <xs:element name="StateCode" />
                    <xs:element name="Street" />
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ShippingStreet" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ShippingCity" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ShippingState" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ShippingPostalCode" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ShippingCountry" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ShippingLatitude" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ShippingLongitude" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ShippingGeocodeAccuracy" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ShippingAddress">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="Accuracy" />
                    <xs:element name="City" />
                    <xs:element name="Country" />
                    <xs:element name="CountryCode" />
                    <xs:element name="Latitude" />
                    <xs:element name="Longitude" />
                    <xs:element name="PostalCode" />
                    <xs:element name="State" />
                    <xs:element name="StateCode" />
                    <xs:element name="Street" />
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="Phone" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Fax" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="AccountNumber" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Website" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="PhotoUrl" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Sic" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Industry" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="AnnualRevenue" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="NumberOfEmployees" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Ownership" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="TickerSymbol" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Rating" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Site" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="OwnerId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CreatedDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CreatedById" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastModifiedDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastModifiedById" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="SystemModstamp" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastActivityDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastViewedDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastReferencedDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Jigsaw" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="JigsawCompanyId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CleanStatus" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="AccountSource" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="DunsNumber" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Tradestyle" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="NaicsCode" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="NaicsDesc" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="YearStarted" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="SicDesc" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="DandbCompanyId" type="xs:string" />

              <xs:element name="flowgear__Active__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__NumberofLocations__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__UpsellOpportunity__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__SLASerialNumber__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__SLAExpirationDate__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__ExternalId__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__Location__c" type="xs:string" />

              <xs:element name="flowgear__Bank_Account_Name__c" type="xs:string" />

Properties.Name: Response
Properties.Value:
<Response>
  <Response>
    <success>false</success>
    <errors>
      <statusCode>INVALID_FIELD_FOR_INSERT_UPDATE</statusCode>
      <message>Unable to create/update fields: CreatedDate, LastActivityDate. Please check the security settings of this field and verify that it is read/write for your profile or permission set.</message>
      <fields>CreatedDate</fields>
      <fields>LastActivityDate</fields>
    </errors>
    <request>
      <attributes>
        <type>Account</type>
        <referenceId>item0</referenceId>
      </attributes>
      <AccountNumber>300741865692</AccountNumber>
      <CreatedDate>2025-05-19T12:26:04.258Z</CreatedDate>
      <LastActivityDate>2025-05-21T13:28:58.122Z</LastActivityDate>
      <Name>Yes Ofcourse</Name>
    </request>
  </Response>
</Response>

Name: HubSpot To Salesforce Accounts
Description: This Workflow retrieves contacts from HubSpot, processes each contact, maps the data, and creates corresponding Account records in Salesforce. It logs success or error for each record based on the Salesforce response.
